title: Ebola Shows Small Signs Of Slowing In Liberia
teaser: U.S. troops have arrived in Liberia to set up emergency hospitals and start training health workers on Ebola care. Correspondent Jason Beaubien updates NPR's Ari Shapiro on the latest from Monrovia.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
